name: The Gurus And Game Changers Podcast

episodes.title: TV Star Escapes 20 Years in a Cult
episodes.description:
💥 In this eye-opening episode, we speak with award-winning actor Dar Dixon (known for roles in This Is Us, NCIS, Scandal, Silicon Valley, and more) about his extraordinary life journey. Dar shares his shocking 20-year involvement in the Eternal Values cult and how he eventually broke free to build a successful acting career in Hollywood. This powerful conversation explores vulnerability, manipulation, and the human capacity for resilience and reinvention.

👩🏻‍💻 Dar's Website: https://www.dardixon.com/
📱 Dar's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dardixon1/#

Chapters with Time Codes:

00:00 - Hosts' Introduction & Episode Highlights
03:16 - Meet Dar Dixon: Actor & Former Cult Member
04:48 - Fleeing the Iranian Revolution at Age 15
06:05 - How Dar Got Involved in the Eternal Values Cult
08:28 - The Size and Structure of the Cult
10:28 - Frederick's Gem Scam & Manipulation Tactics
12:17 - Love Bombing: How Cults Draw People In
12:45 - Living Communally in Manhattan
14:29 - The Dark Side: Criminal Activities in the Cult
16:45 - The Breaking Point: Police Brutality & Escape
18:48 - Frederick's Death & Cover-Up
20:04 - Deprogramming & Finding Healing Through Acting
22:31 - Breaking Into Hollywood: NCIS, This Is Us & More
